channel.title: Maria Mourani
channel.description: Recent news about Maria Mourani, from openparliament.ca.

item.title: Mentioned by CBC.ca
item.description:
Syrian-Montrealers ask Canada to help bring families over
Maria Mourani, the MP for Ahuntsic, said current government policies force Syrian-Canadians to choose between separating from their families or risking their lives to stay together. “It's impossible to think that they would leave the child there and come to ...
